divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside the walmart store waiting on my ride looking up at the stars just the starting to come up in the sky. Was looking at one inpaticular thinking about how beautiful and bright it was when i realized it was moving. In a sow way it moved in a loop and then seemed to get further away and dissapear. The sky was clear that night and it hadnt quiet reached night. This suprised and excited me, unfortunatly my camera phone is slow and i was nto able to get a picture.
